name: MMBE-056 Pre-Sheeting ITP
MMBE-056 Pre-Sheeting
Installation of Ceiling Mounted Brackets and Bracing
1. Verify Approved Shop Drawing Revision (Include photo of title block with drawing number and revision).
2. Mark up and drill ceiling as per shop drawing.
3. Ensure the ceiling has been installed at the correct ceiling height.
Height:
4. Ensure threaded rod, rails and ceiling brackets have been installed as per relevant shop drawing.
5. For ressessed rails - ensure spring clips and side profiles are attached.
6. For ressessed rails - ensure spring clips and emd profiles are attached.
7. Ensure all brackets are tightened with correct torque.
Weight Testing
1. Ensure the rail system has been tested for (SWL x 1.5) 20 minutes.
2. Ensure rail system has been labelled with a completed installer's label.
Serial number provided in asset register.
MMBE-056 Trolley Fit Off ITP
MMBE-056 Trolley Fit Off
Installation/Test of Track Trolley
1. Ensure the track trolley is fully functional.
2. Ensure a lock split has been inserted and locks the end stop in place / tightened.
3. Check and ensure that the travelling trolley moves silently in the rail system.
MMBE-057 Pre-Sheeting ITP
MMBE-057 Pre-Sheeting
Installation of Ceiling Mounted Brackets and Bracing
1. Verify Approved Shop Drawing Revision (Include photo of title block with drawing number and revision).
2. Mark up and drill ceiling as per shop drawing.
3. Ensure the ceiling has been installed at the correct ceiling height.
Height:
4. Ensure threaded rod, rails and ceiling brackets have been installed as per relevant shop drawing.
5. For ressessed rails - ensure spring clips and side profiles are attached.
6. For ressessed rails - ensure spring clips and emd profiles are attached.
7. Ensure all brackets are tightened with correct torque.
Weight Testing

MMBE-057 Hoist Fit OFF ITP
MMBE-057 Hoist Fit OFF
Installation/Test of Ceiling Hoist and Drive Motor
1. Ensure the ceiling hoist has been tested and is fully functional.
2. Ensure that the emergency cord has been cut to 1.9m from the floor
3. Ensure a lock split has been inserted and locks the end stop in place / tightened.
Test of Charging Station, Charging Liners and Remote Control
Ensure that the ceiling hoist charges when the ceiling hoist is placed in the charging station.
Ensure that the ceiling hoist is charged in the charging liners.
Ensure that the remote control has been tested and is fully functional.
Check and ensure that the travelling trolley moves silently in the rail system.
